pageProduct.name: Swisse Kids Eye Health 30 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Kids Eye Health is a premium quality formula containing:
- Lutein, a yellow carotenoid that acts as a filter for blue light in the eye
- Fish oil, important for the development of healthy vision in children
- DHA to maintain healthy vision and eyesight
- Beta-carotene, an antioxidant, to help reduce free radical damage to body cells

Size: 30 Capsules

KEY FEATURES

• Great tasting
• 99.7% sugar free
• No added artificial flavours
• Natural mixed berry flavour
• Convenient chewable capsule
• Sustainably sourced and mercury tested fish oil

Warnings

Contains fish, phenylalanine, soya beans, sucralose & sulfites.

Ingredients

KEY INGREDIENTS: Lutein 7 mg; Concentrated fish omega-3 triglycerides (containing: eicosapentaenoic acid [EPA] 33 mg; docosahexaenoic acid [DHA] 165 mg) 330 mg; Bilberry (Vaccinium myrtillus extract 12.50 mg) equiv. fresh fruit 1 g (min.) standardised to contain anthocyanosides [of Vaccinium myrtillus] 4.50 mg) 1 g (min.); Betacarotene 1 mg.

Directions

2-8 years: One capsule daily. Pierce and squeeze into water, juice or cereal.
9-12 years: One capsule daily. Chew the entire capsule or alternatively, pierce and squeeze into water, juice or cereal.
Or as directed by a healthcare professional. Do not swallow whole.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a cool, dry place.
